languages.text: {n}Соломон складывает руки на груди, обретая неумолимый и подавляющий вид.{/n} "Вступление в свиту — это шанс для такой как ты покончить с позорной деятельностью и начать служить Империуму. Не упусти возможность стать порядочным человеком, торговка".

{n}Solomorne folds his arms, his posture implacable and oppressive.{/n} "Joining the Rogue Trader's retinue is a rare chance for someone like you to leave her shameful activities behind and start serving the Imperium. Do not squander this opportunity to become an honourable person, peddler."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон складывает руки на груди, обретая неумолимый и подавляющий вид.{/n} "Вступление в свиту — это шанс для такой как ты покончить с позорной деятельностью и начать служить Империуму. Не упусти возможность стать порядочным человеком, торговка".

Do not squander this opportunity to become an honourable person, peddler."

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙交叉双臂，摆出了充满压迫感的姿势。{/n}“对于你这样的人来说，能成为行商浪人的随行人员确实是个难能可贵的机会。你可以把可耻的过去彻底抛到脑后，全心全意为帝国服务，当个正派的人。不要浪费了这个机会，小贩。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne folds his arms, his posture implacable and oppressive.{/n} "Joining the Rogue Trader's retinue is a rare chance for someone like you to leave her shameful activities behind and start serving the Imperium. Do not squander this opportunity to become an honourable person, peddler."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙交叉双臂，摆出了充满压迫感的姿势。{/n}“对于你这样的人来说，能成为行商浪人的随行人员确实是个难能可贵的机会。你可以把可耻的过去彻底抛到脑后，全心全意为帝国服务，当个正派的人。不要浪费了这个机会，小贩。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne se cruza de brazos en una postura implacable y opresiva.{/n} «Unirse al séquito de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente es una oportunidad única para que alguien como tú abandone sus vergonzosas actividades y empiece a servir al Imperium. No desperdicies esta ocasión de convertirte en una persona honrada, mercachifle».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne folds his arms, his posture implacable and oppressive.{/n} "Joining the Rogue Trader's retinue is a rare chance for someone like you to leave her shameful activities behind and start serving the Imperium. Do not squander this opportunity to become an honourable person, peddler."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne se cruza de brazos en una postura implacable y opresiva.{/n} «Unirse al séquito de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente es una oportunidad única para que alguien como tú abandone sus vergonzosas actividades y empiece a servir al Imperium. No desperdicies esta ocasión de convertirte en una persona honrada, mercachifle».

languages.text: {n}Solomorne croise les bras sur sa poitrine de manière particulièrement intimidante.{/n} « Rejoindre l'entourage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} est un véritable privilège pour quelqu'un comme vous. C'est l'occasion de renoncer à une vie criminelle afin d'entrer au service de l'Imperium. Ne gâchez pas cette opportunité de devenir une personne respectable, colporteuse. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne folds his arms, his posture implacable and oppressive.{/n} "Joining the Rogue Trader's retinue is a rare chance for someone like you to leave her shameful activities behind and start serving the Imperium. Do not squander this opportunity to become an honourable person, peddler."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne croise les bras sur sa poitrine de manière particulièrement intimidante.{/n} « Rejoindre l'entourage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} est un véritable privilège pour quelqu'un comme vous. C'est l'occasion de renoncer à une vie criminelle afin d'entrer au service de l'Imperium. Ne gâchez pas cette opportunité de devenir une personne respectable, colporteuse. »

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは腕を組んだ。その姿勢は厳格で圧迫感を放っている。{/n}「ローグトレーダーの従者に加わることは、お前のような者にとって、恥ずべき行いを捨てて帝国に仕えるための稀な機会だ。この名誉ある人間になるチャンスを無駄にするな、行商人」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne folds his arms, his posture implacable and oppressive.{/n} "Joining the Rogue Trader's retinue is a rare chance for someone like you to leave her shameful activities behind and start serving the Imperium. Do not squander this opportunity to become an honourable person, peddler."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは腕を組んだ。その姿勢は厳格で圧迫感を放っている。{/n}「ローグトレーダーの従者に加わることは、お前のような者にとって、恥ずべき行いを捨てて帝国に仕えるための稀な機会だ。この名誉ある人間になるチャンスを無駄にするな、行商人」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne kollarını bağlıyor, sert ve baskın bir duruş sergiliyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir'in maiyetine katılmak, senin gibi birinin utanç verici eylemlerini geride bırakıp İmparatorluk'a hizmet etmeye başlaması için az rastlanan bir şans. Şerefli bir insan olmak için karşına çıkan bu fırsatı geri tepme."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne folds his arms, his posture implacable and oppressive.{/n} "Joining the Rogue Trader's retinue is a rare chance for someone like you to leave her shameful activities behind and start serving the Imperium. Do not squander this opportunity to become an honourable person, peddler."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne kollarını bağlıyor, sert ve baskın bir duruş sergiliyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir'in maiyetine katılmak, senin gibi birinin utanç verici eylemlerini geride bırakıp İmparatorluk'a hizmet etmeye başlaması için az rastlanan bir şans. Şerefli bir insan olmak için karşına çıkan bu fırsatı geri tepme."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne verschränkt die Arme, seine Haltung ist unversöhnlich und bedrohlich.{/n} "Der Anschluss an das Gefolge {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} ist eine seltene Gelegenheit für jemanden wie Euch, Euer schändliches Leben hinter Euch zu lassen und in die Dienste des Imperiums zu treten. Verschwendet diese Gelegenheit nicht und werdet ehrbar, Händlerin."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne folds his arms, his posture implacable and oppressive.{/n} "Joining the Rogue Trader's retinue is a rare chance for someone like you to leave her shameful activities behind and start serving the Imperium. Do not squander this opportunity to become an honourable person, peddler."
